EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2013.Invite 3 - Oct 29
EmailTemplate.subject: Reserve Your Spot: Tricentis Accelerate 2013 with voke's Theresa Lanowitz
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!-- -->
Dear Tricentis Clients and Partners,
Don't miss the software testing event of the year!
Register and attend the Accelerate 2013 <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/register/> and you will be automatically entered in a drawing to win an iPad Mini.
Agenda highlights include:
- Future of Driving Business Innovation (voke)
- Software Testing Requirements for a Changing World (Tricentis)
- Business Case for Test Automation: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (Accenture)
<http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/register/>
Choose your own schedule from more than 20 presentations covering topics as as Mobile Testing, Agile Testing, Next Generation Test Automation, Test Data, Risk Based Testing. To view the full agenda visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/en/solutions-day?utm_source=Event&utm_medium=E-Mail&utm_campaign=Accelerate_2013>
I look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best Regards,
Ajay Murthy
Chief Marketing Officer
Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
